chapters.title: Chapter 20: The Golden Crane
chapters.info: Tumad Ahzkan, p. 425—Young lieutenant in Bashere's army, and commander of his personal escort. He could think clearly and see beyond what was in front of him. He was tall, though still two hands shorter than Bael, and had a thick black beard. Bashere was grooming him for a higher rank until he was killed by trollocs in Tear.
